Public Class XamlMember Implements IEquatable(Of XamlMember)

summary.span: 为 XAML 类型的成员提供 XAML 类型系统标识符。

span.span: Provides the XAML type system identifier for members of XAML types.

summary.span: 该标识符由 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器在处理成员节点的过程中使用（如果 XAML 读取器位于 上），另外还用于常规 XAML 类型系统逻辑。

span.span: The identifier is used by XAML readers and XAML writers during processing of member nodes (when the XAML reader is positioned on a ) and also for general XAML type system logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用三个方法用于返回有关 XAML 成员的信息： 标准公共语言运行时 (CLR) 反射;调用内部的仅引用反射技术 Api 该使用优化位标志;调入虚拟重写或`Lookup*`可能由提供的 API子类。 can use three methodologies for returning information about a XAML member: standard common language runtime (CLR) reflection; a reference-only reflection technique calling internal APIs that use optimized bit flags; or calling into virtual overrides of the `Lookup*` API that is provided by possible subclasses. 大部分使用.NET Framework XAML 服务 Api 和API，你将使用默认 XAML 架构上下文。For most uses of .NET Framework XAML Services APIs and the API, you use the default XAML schema context. .NET Framework XAML 服务的默认 XAML 架构上下文使用 CLR 后备类型系统。The default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services uses CLR backing for the type system. 这使 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器，以处理任何类型或成员定义在中，或其他可用于、 CLR 和其反射技术。This enables the XAML readers and XAML writers to work with any type or member that is defined in, or otherwise available to, the CLR and its reflection techniques. ## 查找 \* Api 和 XamlMember 派生类Lookup\* APIs and XamlMember Derived Classes 定义了几个派生类的虚拟成员可能会重写。 defines several virtual members that derived classes might override. 这些成员的名称的字符串始终开头`Lookup`。These members have names that always start with the string `Lookup`. API 的其余部分名称然后引用虚拟方法影响的属性。The remainder of the API name then references the property that the virtual method influences. 例如，派生的类可能会重写来影响哪些的基本定义的属性返回派生类中。For example, a derived class might override to influence what the base-defined property returns in a derived class. 您可以预测中的这些属性的返回值或现有派生类通过阅读相关的文档`Lookup*`方法。You can predict return values for such properties in or existing derived classes by reading the documentation for the relevant `Lookup*` methods. 用途`Lookup*`方法是提供一种 XAML 类型系统扩展方法包含基类。The purpose of the `Lookup*` methods is to provide a XAML type system extension technique that incorporates the base class. 通过从派生和重写`Lookup`虚拟成员，你可以定义 XAML 成员的 XAML 架构的概念中的 XAML 类型系统而不受限于的后备类型系统或技术的详细信息。By deriving from and overriding the `Lookup` virtual members, you can define the concept of a XAML member for a XAML schema in a XAML type system without being tied to the specifics of a backing type system or technology. 你可以还使用在此方案下，提供的 XAML 架构上下文，并仍返回所需的结果。You can also use a provided XAML schema context under this scheme and still return the results you want. 作为示例，请考虑属性。As an example, consider the property . 此属性通知调用方该操作，例如使用的序列化可以将一个值写入此成员对目标对象。This property informs callers that operations such as using a for serialization can write a value for this member on a target object. 在默认实现中，通过使用针对后备 CLR 反射技术进行确定成员是否可写和其成员 ( )。In the default implementation, the determination of whether the member is writable is made by using reflection techniques against the backing CLR and its members (the ). 因此，默认情况下，XAML 类型系统依赖于 CLR 类型系统。Therefore, by default, the XAML type system depends on the CLR type system. 但是，你可以为你 XAML 类型系统的报表的删除此依赖关系通过重写 API 。However, you can remove this dependency for your XAML type system reporting of by overriding the API . 重写中，你可以使用其他决定，例如特定于您的技术，主查找表中可写 XAML 成员是否为固定的 XAML 词汇或其他策略用于确定各种优化的元数据你XAML 词汇。Within your override, you can use other determinations, such as metadata that is specific to your technology, a master lookup table that is optimized for a fixed XAML vocabulary, or a variety of other strategies for determining whether a XAML member is writable in your XAML vocabulary. ## 构造 XamlMember 而无需 XAML 架构上下文Constructing XamlMember Without XAML Schema Context 大多数构造函数的需要作为其初始化的一部分。Most constructors of require a as part of their initialization. ，还有必要对于许多内部操作，例如获取被转发从后备类型的信息。The is also necessary for many internal operations, such as obtaining information that is being forwarded from the backing type. 当你正在使用API，你通常具有如也是可从周边构造。When you are working with the API, you typically have a that is available from a surrounding construct such as a . 在这种情况下，你可以将传递引用通过对所有需要 XAML 架构上下文的 XAML 类型系统调用。In this case, you can pass the reference through to all XAML type system calls that require a XAML schema context. 一个特定的构造函数， ，不需要。One specific constructor, , does not require a . 但是，构造签名返回`true`为。However, a that is constructed with the signature returns `true` for . 涉及了加载路径，此类成员不能写入到对象图。For a load path that involves , such a member cannot be written into an object graph. 使用.NET Framework XAML 服务实现中，调用会引发时相关报表`true`为。Using the .NET Framework XAML services implementation, the call throws a when the relevant reports `true` for . 不应构造，其值为`true`为除非你实现可以处理从异常，或通过其他方式来调整行为。You should not construct a that has a value of `true` for unless your implementation can handle the exceptions from , or you have other ways to adjust the behavior. 例如，一个或多个以下可能的实现 true:For example, one or more of the following might be true of your implementation: - XAML 架构上下文是更高版本可用。The XAML schema context is available later. - 使用成员调用程序模式。You use a member invoker pattern. - 您有意重写中自定义 XAML 编写器。You deliberately override in a custom XAML writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值通常设置在初始化期间，而且通常不是`null`。This value is typically set during initialization and is usually not `null`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 可以传递信息在由构造函数进行初始化。 information can be passed in by constructors for initialization. 通过直接调入基类的构造函数，初始化派生的类可以省略某些在基类中进行值检查。By calling directly into base constructors, initialization for derived classes can omit some of the value-checks that are made in the base class. 因此，派生的初始化可以更改 XAML 成员的报告的类型成员关系信息，以便它不再按预期的方式与其基础 CLR 声明的类型系统信息一致。Therefore, the derived initialization can change the reported type-member relationship information of a XAML member so that it no longer aligns in an expected way with the type system information of its underlying CLR declaration. 对于声明的类型信息的任何安全关键检查，请改为使用的基础 CLR 类型。For any security-critical checks of declaring type information, use the underlying CLR type instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时，将调用或该方法的特定重写。Calling invokes or a specific override of that method. 在其中的初始内部反射逻辑还未设置信息的情况下会发生此行为。This behavior occurs in cases where the initial internal reflection logic has not already set the information. `DependsOn`模式可以应用于故意矛盾常规的 XAML 规则的对象模型事例。The `DependsOn` pattern can be applied to object model cases that deliberately contradict a general XAML rule. 一般的 XAML 规则是一种类型的初始化文本作为 （或通过在 XAML 2009 的工厂方法） 不传递的成员必须能够以任意顺序指定。The general XAML rule is that members of a type that are not passed as initialization text (or by a factory method in XAML 2009) must be able to be assigned in any order. 通过应用`DependsOn`模式于成员，你可以指示 XAML 编写器始终处理之前此成员引用的成员。By applying a `DependsOn` pattern to a member, you can instruct XAML writers to always process the referenced member before this member. 你可以应用在其中的当前成员的值需要上下文或其他成员设置之后才可用的其他信息的情况下此模式。You can apply this pattern in situations where the value of the current member requires context or other information that is only available after the other member is set. `DependsOn`应谨慎地应用模式，并将其保留为它所服务体系结构的用途的属性方案。The `DependsOn` pattern should be applied judiciously and reserved for property scenarios where it serves an architectural purpose. 大量的依赖项也可能会减慢 XAML 处理。Large numbers of dependencies have the potential to slow down XAML processing. 另外，它还有可能产生循环依赖关系，在这种情况下的 XAML 处理行为是不确定。Also, it is possible to produce circular dependencies, in which case the XAML processing behavior is undefined. 示例`DependsOn`方案从 WPF 上包括某些属性和上，然后在。Example `DependsOn` scenarios from WPF include certain properties on and , on , and on .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值是可附加的和非可附加成员的不同。The returned value is different for attachable and non-attachable members. 对于非可附加成员，返回。For non-attachable members, returns . 对于可附加成员，返回基于此逻辑的结果：For attachable members, returns a result that is based on this logic: - 如果反射无法解决一个后备 ( `true`)，此方法返回表示泛型对象类型的内部常量。If reflection cannot resolve a backing ( `true`), this method returns an internal constant that represents a generic object type. - 如果前面的条件不适用，调用。If the previous condition does not apply, is called. 默认实现返回基于检查实现的方法`get`和`set`访问器。The default implementation returns a that is based on examining the methods that implement the `get` and `set` accessors. 类可能会重写以使用不同的行为，如其他元数据窗体，可能会报告目标类型对于附加的成员。A class might override to use a different behavior such as other metadata forms that might report target types for attachable members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时，将调用或该方法的特定重写。Calling invokes or a specific override of that method. 当初始内部反射逻辑还未设置信息时，将发生这种情况。This occurs when the initial internal reflection logic has not already set the information. 默认行为 (没有重写)，返回可以具有不同的概念含义。In the default behavior (no override), the returned can have different conceptual meanings. 适用的含义取决于是否这表示属性、 方法或事件，如以下列表所示：Which meaning applies depends on whether this represents a property, method, or event, as the following list shows: - 对于属性，返回是设置的属性或属性返回的类型。For a property, the returned is the type that sets the property or is returned by the property. - 事件，返回是必需的事件处理程序类型 （中的 CLR 实现的委托）。For an event, the returned is the required event handler type (a delegate in a CLR implementation). - 对于方法，是该方法中，这可能是返回类型`null`。For a method, is the return type of that method, which may be `null`. 在每种情况下，XAML 架构上下文用于评估从后备类型的 XAML 类型。In each case, the XAML schema context is used to evaluate the XAML type from the backing type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时，将调用或该方法的特定重写。Calling invokes or a specific override of that method. 当初始内部反射逻辑还未设置信息时，将发生此行为。This behavior occurs when the initial internal reflection logic has not already set the information. 返回非 null 属性的实现值不一定是一个有效的。Implementations that return a non-null property value for are not necessarily a working . 以下是可能的非 null 返回值的列表以及这些值表示的含义：The following is a list of possible non-null return values for and what these values represent: - 返回值报告特定于该成员或更普遍地为转换器的目标类型特性化的类型转换器。The return value reports a type converter that is attributed specifically to that member or more generally to the target type of the converter. 此行为通常是哪些大多数的 XAML 类型系统和 XAML 处理器所查找的为了实例化的类型转换器和调用其方法。This behavior is typically what most XAML type systems and XAML processors look for in order to instantiate a type converter and invoke its methods. - 返回值将报告内置值转换器。The return value reports a built-in value converter. 这些转换器存在由 XAML 编写器执行某些内部操作。These converters exist for certain internal operations that are performed by a XAML writer. 具体而言，这些内置值转换器将原始属性字符串值转换为 XAML 语言级别基元。In particular, these built-in value converters convert the raw attribute string values to the XAML language-level primitives. 有关.NET Framework XAML 服务实现中，这些内置类型转换通常将转发给系统程序集中定义的类型转换器。For the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, these built-in type conversions often forward to a type converter that is defined in the System assembly. 例如，为转换值具有内置转发转换，因此，值引用。For example, a conversion for an value has built-in forwarded conversion, and therefore, the value references . - 返回值报告的不受约束的对象模型; 的特殊情况下也就是说，具有值。The return value reports the special case of an unconstrained object model; that is, the has a value of . 在这种情况下，报告是 {`Object}`。In this case, the reports that the is {`Object}`. 但是，是`null`因为没有实际的类型或实例是可用于执行此转换。However, is `null` because no actual type or instance is available to perform this conversion. 相反，直到运行时，当该特定技术的运行时确定其对象图的处理都无法确定对象模型行为。Instead, the object model behavior cannot be determined until run time, when the runtime of the specific technology determines the handling of its object graph. 如果可以访问工作从，你可以调用它的转换方法。If you can access a working from , you can invoke its conversion methods. 但是，多个转换方法依赖于服务上下文。However, many conversion methods rely on service context. 如果你没有可用的类型转换器预期的写入对象的对象图其典型角色的相同的服务上下文，则转换器方法可以引发异常。If you do not have the same service context available that the type converter expects for its typical role of writing objects for object graphs, the converter methods can throw exceptions.
